unittitle_ssm: United Front of Cairo, Illinois Photographs
abstract_ssm: This collection contains photographs of the United Front of Cairo, Illinois protesting against white owned businesses in downtown Cairo in the early 1970s, which were in response against violent attacks on the African American community. The protests document the struggle between the black and white populations in Cairo.
corpname_ssm: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
subject_ssm: African Americans -- Civil rights -- Pictorial works
African Americans -- Civil rights -- United States
collection_ssm: United Front of Cairo, Illinois Photographs
heading_ssm: United Front of Cairo, Illinois Photographs
